mapper.insert: insert into iym_loss_record (id, lsh, mxh, iym_inventory_id, gsm_goods_id, ph, pch, split_quantity, quantity, cost_price, average_cost_price, purchase_tax_rate, sell_tax_rate, produced_date, expiry_date, pem_supplier_id, iym_inventory_add_id, notes, sys_clinic_id, creator_id, creation_date, approver_id, approve_date, approve_state ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iymInventoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gsmGoodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{splitQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{averageCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{purchaseTaxRate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sellTaxRate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{producedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{expiryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{pemSupplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iymInventoryAddId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysClinicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{approverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{approveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{approveState,jdbcType=TINYINT} )
mapper.update: update iym_loss_record set lsh = #{lsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mxh = #{mxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iym_inventory_id = #{iymInventoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gsm_goods_id = #{gsmGoodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ph = #{ph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pch = #{pch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, split_quantity = #{splitQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, average_cost_price = #{averageCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, purchase_tax_rate = #{purchaseTaxRate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sell_tax_rate = #{sellTaxRate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, produced_date = #{producedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, expiry_date = #{expiryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, pem_supplier_id = #{pemSupplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, iym_inventory_add_id = #{iymInventoryAddId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_clinic_id = #{sysClinicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approver_id = #{approverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approve_date = #{approveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approve_state = #{approveState,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, lsh, mxh, iym_inventory_id, gsm_goods_id, ph, pch, split_quantity, quantity, cost_price, average_cost_price, purchase_tax_rate, sell_tax_rate, produced_date, expiry_date, pem_supplier_id, iym_inventory_add_id, notes, sys_clinic_id, creator_id, creation_date, approver_id, approve_date, approve_state from iym_loss_record where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, lsh, mxh, iym_inventory_id, gsm_goods_id, ph, pch, split_quantity, quantity, cost_price, average_cost_price, purchase_tax_rate, sell_tax_rate, produced_date, expiry_date, pem_supplier_id, iym_inventory_add_id, notes, sys_clinic_id, creator_id, creation_date, approver_id, approve_date, approve_state from iym_loss_record

select * from view_iym_loss_record
(sysClinicId = #{sysClinicId}) and
(DATE_FORMAT(creationDate, '%Y-%m-%d') between #{creationDate[0]} and #{creationDate[1]}) and
(approveState = #{approveState}) and
(sysClinicName like '${sysClinicName}%' or sysClinicCode like '${sysClinicName}%') and
(lsh like '${lsh}%') and
order by creationDate desc, mxh

select * from view_iym_loss_record
(sysClinicId = #{sysClinicId}) and
(DATE_FORMAT(creationDate, '%Y-%m-%d') between #{creationDate[0]} and #{creationDate[1]}) and
(approveState = #{approveState}) and
(lsh like '${lsh}%') and
group by lsh order by creationDate desc
